name: Avoid The Quack
description:
You are a fragile dandelion gliding through the skies, when you see ducks coming your way! You will need to dodge their peaks or you will not have any stems left.

This prototype is meant to be joyful and colourful. I made the art and music with that purpose in mind.

This game is a prototype made for the Weekly Game Jam with the theme "Glide".

Enjoy!
